name: SmartAzan
0: ”Alexa, ask smart azan to automate all azans.”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: smart azan
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Alexa, ask smart azan to automate all azans.


SmartAzan is the first application to provide a truly automated azan experience. With SmartAzan, the azan will play automatically on any Alexa-enabled speaker. This includes all Alexa Echo Devices, Alexa Display Devices, Smart TVs with Alexa built-in, and even Amazon Fire TV.

After you enable this skill please visit https://www.smartazan.com/alexa/ to setup azan settings (such as address & calculation methods).
